TopicTitle: Hi Antiles here with Kerbal Space Endeavour.

Articles.Content:
Hey there fellow KSP-Fans,

I finally decided to join the forum and thought I interduce myself.

I have been playing KSP for a while now and i started making a series out of it as well, if you want to check it out:

May your design not be as flawed as you think.
Welcome to the forums Antiles, looks like a cool series, good luck with it and have fun

Ive been really enjoying your series so far! Couple of requests for this thread!

Could you post a list of what mods you are using.

Also can you post links to the .craft files you have provided on your videos (save having to hunt videos to find the files).

Keep up the good work!
